name: Cartoon Magic world
description:
This is a relaxed and magical cartoon world.Everything in the wizarding world is magic, and powerful enemies are your best chance to improve yourself.Maybe you don't know what magic is, but once you get into the game, you know how wonderful magic is.Welcome to the wizarding world.
The game is still accelerating and the world is where the heart goes.
Game features:
■ Integrated world view: Rich plot waiting for you to explore, complete the mission to improve the character's ability to fight.


■ Rich monsters :20 types of monsters, different combat modes.Killing it gives you a sense of accomplishment.


■ Powerful Boss: The Boss increases the difficulty of the game, but the pleasure of beating it is also our goal.

■ We will listen to the suggestions of the players and plot out the magic world in everyone's mind.

Welcome to join QQ group :739927074
